summary.span: 实现基数据传输机制。

span.span: Implements a basic data transfer mechanism.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口，其方法提供的数据传输格式无关机制。 implements the interface, whose methods provide a format-independent mechanism for data transfer. A通常用于和在拖放操作。A is typically used with the and in drag-and-drop operations. 类提供的建议的实现接口。The class provides the recommended implementation of the interface. 建议你使用类，而不是实现自己。It is suggested that you use the class rather than implementing yourself. 多个不同格式的数据可以存储在。Multiple pieces of data in different formats can be stored in a . 从检索数据由其关联的格式。Data is retrieved from a by its associated format. 因为目标应用程序可能未知，你可以提高的数据将以正确的格式为应用程序通过将中的数据的可能性以多种格式。Because the target application might not be known, you can increase the likelihood that the data will be in the appropriate format for an application by placing the data in a in multiple formats. 请参阅对预定义的格式。See for the predefined formats. 你可以通过创建的实例实现您自己的格式类。You can implement your own format by creating an instance of the class. 若要将数据存储在，将数据传递给构造函数或调用。To store data in a , pass the data to the constructor or call . 你可以将数据多种格式添加到同一个。You can add data in multiple formats to the same . 如果您希望数据则添加要在其本机格式，这仅调用检索与`autoConvert`参数设置为`false`。If you want the data you add to be retrieved in its native format only, call with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`. 可以从检索数据与兼容的任何格式。Data can be retrieved from a in any format which is compatible with . 例如，文本可以转换为 Unicode。For example, text can be converted to Unicode. 若要检索已存储的格式中的数据，请调用与`autoConvert`参数设置为`false`。To retrieve data in the format in which it was stored, call with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`. 若要确定的数据存储在何种格式，请调用。To determine what formats the data is stored in, call . 若要确定一种格式是否可用，请调用与所需的格式。To determine if a format is available, call with the desired format. 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]、类提供了其他方法，使得更轻松地处理数据通用格式。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the class provides additional methods that make it easier to work with data in common formats. 若要添加到特定格式的数据，使用适当`Set`*格式*方法，如。To add data of a particular format to the , use the appropriate `Set`*Format* method, such as . 若要检索的从某一特定格式的数据，首先调用相应`Contains`*格式*方法 (如) 以确定是否包含数据以的格式，然后调用相应`Get`*格式*方法 (如) 来检索数据，如果包含它。To retrieve data of a particular format from the , first call the appropriate `Contains`*Format* method (such as ) to determine whether the contains data in that format, then call the appropriate `Get`*Format* method (such as ) to retrieve the data if the contains it. > [!NOTE] > 使用剪贴板使用图元文件格式时，可能需要特殊的注意事项。Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the Clipboard. 由于在当前实现中的限制使用较旧的图元文件格式的应用程序可能无法识别类，使用.NET Framework 的图元文件格式。Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format. 在这种情况下，你必须进行互操作与 Win32 剪贴板应用程序编程接口 (Api)。In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs). 有关详细信息，请参阅 323530，"图元文件上剪贴板是不可见对所有应用程序，"在 Microsoft 知识库文章在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article 323530, "Metafiles on Clipboard Are Not Visible to All Applications," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. > > 对象必须可序列化，才能将其放在剪贴板上。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 请参阅有关序列化的详细信息。See for more information on serialization. 如果目标应用程序需要一种非常具体的数据格式，标头添加到序列化过程中的数据可能会阻止应用程序不能识别你的数据。If your target application requires a very specific data format, the headers added to the data in the serialization process may prevent the application from recognizing your data. 若要保留数据格式，请添加你的数据作为数组到并将传递到方法。To preserve your data format, add your data as a array to a and pass the to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将中的数据添加。The following code example adds data in a . 首先，新创建和组件存储在其中。First, a new is created and a component is stored in it. 然后，它会检查以查看相应的类型中的数据是否存在于。Then, it checks to see if data in the appropriate type exists in the . 结果显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created. [!code-cpp[Classic DataObject Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataObject Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataObject Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下一个示例检索中存储的数据。The next example retrieves the data stored in a . 首先，新创建了文本数据。First, a new is created with text data. 然后，检索数据时，将其格式指定为字符串，并显示在文本框中。Then, the data is retrieved, specifying its format as a string, and displayed in a text box. 数据格式自动从文本转换为字符串。The data format is automatically converted from text to string. 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created. [!code-cpp[Classic DataObject Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataObject Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic DataObject Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法找不到指定的格式中的数据，它将尝试将数据转换为格式。If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，或使用自动转换设置为存储数据`false`，此方法返回`null`。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`. 若要确定是否数据相关联，或者可以转换为一种格式，请调用之前调用。To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call before calling . 调用有关的有效数据的格式存储在此列表。Call for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this . > [!NOTE] > 如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. > > 当`format`是，此方法返回的 utf-8 编码字符串的应用程序面向.NET 4.5 或更高版本，并且 ANSI 编码面向.NET 4.0 或更低的应用程序中的字符串。When `format` is , this method returns a UTF-8 encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.5 or higher, and an ANSI encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.0 or lower. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索中存储的数据。The following code example retrieves the data stored in a . 首先，新创建了文本数据。First, a new is created with text data. 然后，检索数据时，将其格式指定为字符串，并显示在文本框中。Then, the data is retrieved, specifying its format as a string, and displayed in a text box. 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`autoConvert`参数是`true`和此方法不能在指定的格式中查找数据，它会尝试将数据转换为格式。If the `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，或使用自动转换设置为存储数据`false`，此方法返回`null`。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with the automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`. 如果`autoConvert`参数是`false`，此方法返回数据中指定的格式，或`null`如果找不到此格式中的没有数据。If the `autoConvert` parameter is `false`, this method returns data in the specified format, or `null` if no data in this format can be found. 若要确定是否数据相关联，或者可以转换为一种格式，请调用之前调用。To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call before calling . 调用有关的有效数据的格式存储在此列表。Call for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this . > [!NOTE] > 如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. > > 当`format`是，此方法返回的 utf-8 编码字符串的应用程序面向.NET 4.5 或更高版本，并且 ANSI 编码面向.NET 4.0 或更低的应用程序中的字符串。When `format` is , this method returns a UTF-8 encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.5 or higher, and an ANSI encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.0 or lower. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索中存储的数据，使用`autoConvert`参数来指定是否将转换的数据格式。The following code example retrieves the data stored in a , using the `autoConvert` parameter to specify whether to convert the data format. 首先，新创建了文本数据。First, a new is created with text data. 然后此示例尝试检索数据，将其格式指定为字符串而不进行格式转换，即`autoConvert`参数是`false`。Then the example tries to retrieve the data, specifying its format as a string and no format conversion, that is, the `autoConvert` parameter is `false`. 此操作会失败，因为中的没有字符串数据。This operation fails because there is no string data in the . 接下来，此示例尝试再次，检索数据与`autoConvert`参数设置为`true`。Next, the example tries to retrieve the data again, with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `true`. 此操作成功，结果显示在。This operation succeeds and the results are displayed in a . 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created.
